author: Kevin Patra
title: Arians on landing Brady: He brings us leadership - NFL.com
description: Arians on landing Brady: He brings us leadership NFL.com Bruce Arians explains how the Bucs got Tom Brady | NFL Live ESPN Patriots projected to receive four compensatory draft picks in 2021 Pats Pulpit Mike Freeman's 10-Point Stance: Judging a Frantic NFL Off…
content:
Bruce Arians didn't blow smoke, as so many franchises do about quarterbacks, regarding the Tampa Bay Buccaneers' plans to search the signal-caller market for a possible replacement for Jameis Winston. 
The straight-shooter said point-blank several times the … [+3465 chars]
